title: Second Place in Indonesian Student Entrepreneurship Innovation Competition
description: Innovation in making goods from low-value materials is a creative and value-added effort, namely changing waste or cheap materials into useful, unique, and more valuable products. This step not only supports waste reduction and resource conservation, but also opens up business opportunities, improves the economy, and makes a positive contribution to society.
